verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Satisfied, I'll not be Satisfied, Till I Awake in thy likeness Lord.
Satisfied, I'll not be Satisfied, till I awake in thy likeness Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You Open your Hand and satisfy the desire of every living thing.
you open your hand and satisfy the desire of every living thing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Satisfied, then I'll be satisfied, when I awake in thy likeness Lord.
Satisfied, then I'll be satisfied when I awake in thy likeness, Lord.
